title: Frugality
description: Frugality and minimalism are the truest virtues, in all aspects of life.

title: Suffering
description: All in life is suffering, there is no escaping it.

title: Excellence
description: I must become the best at everything, the strongest, most beautiful, most intelligent person around, all the time.

title: Connection
description: Only human interactions give meaning to life. Socializing and spending time with others is the most valuable thing a person can do.

title: Iconoclast
description: Nothing is sacred, all beliefs are lies. This character will do everything they can to reveal the lies of tradition, rules and religion to the whole world.

title: Chosen One
description: They have chosen you—their secrets have been revealed to you alone. You must learn more, uncover the Truth, and others must help you no matter what.

title: Exclusion
description: Strangers are not to be trusted. Only those who you already know are worth your time and help.

title: Anger
description: It’s not your fault, it’s the world’s fault. You know how everything should be, but everybody else gets it wrong and you hate them for it.

title: Protector
description: You must help and protect others (often even from themselves). Only you can save them all.

title: Hedonism
description: Life’s short, you better enjoy it while you can. Nothing’s gonna stop you from having a good time, all the time.

title: Shame
description: You try your best, but you’re useless. Everything you do is wrong and you cannot stop apologizing for not measuring up.

title: Righteousness
description: There’s only one way of doing things: the Right Way. Follow the rules, obey your superiors and everything will go smoothly. Those who disobey protocol are a danger to us all, and they must be stopped.
